The binding affinity of the compounds of the invention to the H<sub>3</sub> receptor may be demonstrated by the procedure described below: 
Histamine H<sub>3</sub> receptor affinity was determined in rat cortical membranes using the H<sub>3</sub> selective agonist iigand, [<sup>3</sup>H]-N<sup>α</sup>-methylhistamine (78.9 Ci/mmole, 
The binding assay was carried out in polypropylene tubes in a total volume of 0.4 mi of 50 mM Na<sup>+</sup> Phosphate buffer (pH 7.4), containing 1 50-200 μg of tissue protein, 0.8-1 .2 nM [<sup>3</sup>H]-N<sup>α</sup>-methylhistamine and 0.3 to 10,000 nM GT-2016.
